ygData.subject: Re: TALIES 22nd level
ygData.msgSnippet: I went from 22 to 25 in 4 days fighting in lake rathe. ok, mostly on DW pets which are not AS common now, but i also fought aviak guards. there are several
ygData.messageBody:
I went from 22 to 25 in 4 days fighting in lake rathe. ok, mostly on DW
pets which are not AS common now, but i also fought aviak guards. there
are several places you can solo in lake rathe, and also som good group
spots.

I thought i would have to stop with aviaks at 24th, but i still got xp
from them at 25th, even though some of them were green. You may say that
fighting greens is not good use of time, but aviaks come in 2 main
varieties, that i can tell, the 18-19 version and the 20-21 version.
they basically spawn 50-50. So i was fighting a blue 75% of the time and
a green giving xp 25% of the time. Almost no down time also. And decent
loot, up to a plat in coins, a rare bronze weapon and occasional word or
rune.
